In a fantasy world populated by fantastical creatures and monsters, a man named Fa Hai (Jet Li) has a very important mission: to keep the demons away from humanity at all costs. Hai is a martial arts master and a powerful sorcerer, coming from Temple Jinsham, and travels the world doing their job very well. When the young healer Xu Zian (Raymond Lam) is collecting herbs in the mountains, meets a beautiful young woman (Eva Huang) with whom he falls in love. However, the beautiful young woman is a White Snake, a demon half human, half snake, who lives with his sister, Green Snake. The forbidden love between the two may arise imbalance of forces that govern the world and Fa Hai, along with its allies, to do the impossible to prevent this from happening.
